article_title: Editorial: Capito best choice for U.S. Senate
article_text:
Huntington, WV (25701)

Today

Chance of late night showers.

Tonight

Partly cloudy skies this evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers late. Thunder possible. Low 64F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

article_metadata.author: The Herald-Dispatch

og.description: West Virginia's U.S. Senate race this year will have an historic outcome no matter who wins.
